channel.title: How to run a 317 server?
channel.description: Hey, i downloaded a 317 server source and there's no run or compile file, how can i run it? thank you.

item.title: How to run a 317 server?
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

Go download a different one and copy and paste the different source onto the one without it. Or you could do everyone a favour and not leech, but if your using it as a base an actually coding, then that’s cool.

Read full topic

item.title: How to run a 317 server?
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

-.- is it a executable java file? if it is, extract it with winrar and then download a decompiler and translate the class files and make a java file out of them… if that’s to complicated, then just use a source that DOES have the java files…
btw, don’t post multiple threads.

Read full topic

item.title: How to run a 317 server?
item.dc:creator: @facundo facundo
item.description:
@facundo wrote:

i don’t understand whatyou put about that codes, but the source im using is holy blitz and it has 3 folders, i dont understand cuz it hasnt client.java and such staff to edit my server… help me please

Read full topic

item.title: How to run a 317 server?
item.dc:creator: @Runite Runite
item.description:
@Runite wrote:

imsokool22:

i cant help you because a source shuld have a run and compile if it doesnt find it in the tut section its called mod tahroks compiler

If you can’t help then why the fuck would you post?

Does your source have multiple packages (folders with other java files in them) or is it all in the same folder? If your source is the latter:

java Server

That’s all you really need. If not, please post what source you’re using.

The same goes for the compiler, if you don’t have packages just use:

javac *.java pause
Otherwise, same thing, just post your source.

Read full topic
